title: Mundo Cleaver Bug [Gameplay]
body:
There is a visual issue with the default Mundo's cleavers. I was just laning against one and they were literally unable to be seen when he threw them. You could see his throwing animation, and they hit correctly, but you could not see the projectile traveling through the air. This, of course, made them incredibly hard to dodge and detect in teamfights or pokewars.

To recreate, simply play Mundo with no skin and throw cleavers, simple as that. I confirmed with a few other players that said they were having the same issue to ensure it wasn't simply on my end.

replies.body: Mundo's cleaver have been bugged since beta anyway, they have a wonky hitbox and tend to hit when they should have missed and miss when they should've hit. They also have a tendency to be invisible whenever Mundo goes in and out of your vision. They tried fixing it a couple of time, but Mundo doesn't seem to care.

Hey there! 

Have you tried repairing your client recently? If the issue is still persisting, would you mind attaching your DXDiag? 

Thanks!
Just saw this today. Was against a corporate Mundo. Everyone on my team could not see the cleavers.

Can comfirm. 

Just played a game against a Mundo, and Literally EVERY SINGLE cleaver was invisible.

Also, fix that http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2jyv66/game_breaking_bug_riot_please_read/
I've been unable to see Lux's E. It only happened once, but the middle part of the E was invisible, making it much harder to detect.

I've only witnessed this problem when the Mundo in question was using the Executioner Mundo skin.
I've also seen (er, been unable to see) invisible Highland Tryndameres. I've only seen two or three in-game, ever, but they were all invisible.
happened to me yesterday on an ARAM.  No one on my team could see them either.
